changes.raw_text: Large mineral node value increased from 1500 to 1800 (small nodes remain 900).
Vespene Geyser value increased from 2000 to 2250.
Removed Auto-Turret, Point Defense Drone, and Seeker Missile abilities.
Added Interference Matrix: Disables a Mechanical or Psionic unit, preventing attacks and abilities for 6 seconds.
Added Repair Drone: Deploys a drone for 90 seconds that automatically repairs nearby friendly Mechanical units at 12.6 life per second (1 energy per 3 life).
Added Anti-Armor Missile: After a 2-second arming period, pursues targets, dealing 30 splash damage and reducing affected units' armor by 3 for 21 seconds.
New upgrade Enhanced Munitions (Starport Tech Lab, 150/150, 79s): Increases Anti-Armor Missile explosion radius by 20% and tracking range by 50%.
Defender Mode no longer grants a sight range bonus, but the unit now gains vision of the targeted location while in Defender Mode.
Lock On: The first four shots now fire quickly.
New upgrade Rapid Fire Launchers (Factory Tech Lab, 150/150, 79s): Increases the attack speed of the first 12 Lock On shots.
Starts with the Cloak ability.
Starting energy reduced from 75 to 50.
New upgrade Moebius Reactor (Ghost Academy, 100/100, 57s): Increases starting energy by 25.
New upgrade Smart Servos (Factory Tech Lab, 150/150, 79s): Allows faster transformation between Hellion and Hellbat.
New upgrade Smart Servos (Factory Tech Lab, 150/150, 79s): Allows faster transformation between Hellbat and Hellion.
New upgrade Smart Servos (Factory Tech Lab, 150/150, 79s): Allows faster transformation between Fighter and Assault modes.
New upgrade Smart Servos (Factory Tech Lab, 150/150, 79s): Allows faster switching between weapon modes.
Now revealed while Sentinel Missile is on cooldown.
Unit removed from the game.
Now has energy (200 max, starts at 50).
Chrono Boost reworked: Costs 50 energy and causes the target structure to operate 100% faster for 10 seconds.
Added Mass Recall: Recalls units in the target area to the Nexus (50 energy; 3.6s warp-out pause; 0.4s warp-in).
Photon Overcharge removed.
Mass Recall changed to Strategic Recall: Recalls all player units in the target area to the Mothership; has no cooldown and does not share a global cooldown with Nexus Mass Recall.
Purification Nova now detonates on contact with enemy units (detonation radius 0.25).
Purification Nova cooldown reduced from 21.4 to 14.3 seconds.
Purification Nova will not trigger on enemy structures or changelings.
New ability Surveillance Mode: Increases vision by 25% and immobilizes the Observer.
Gains a basic attack (Psi Blast): 4 damage, 1.25 weapon speed, range 6, targets ground units.
Thermal Lance base range increased from 6 to 7.
Thermal Lance damage changed from 12 to 10 (+5 vs Light).
Protoss Ground Weapons upgrades now add +1 to base damage and +1 vs Light for Thermal Lance.
Extended Thermal Lance upgrade cost reduced from 200/200 to 150/150.
Extended Thermal Lance range bonus reduced from +3 to +2.
Interceptor cost increased from 10 to 15 minerals.
Particle Disruptors damage changed from 10 (+4 vs Armored) to 15 (+6 vs Armored).
Weapon speed changed from 1.0 to 1.54 (slower).
Now receives +2 base damage per level of Protoss Ground Weapons upgrades.
Revelation duration reduced from 43 to 30 seconds.
Stasis Ward no longer affects Zerg larva or eggs.
Stasis Ward now has a 170-second timed life.
Pulsar Beam changed from Spell to Normal damage; armor now reduces Pulsar Beam damage.
Shade vision increased from 2 to 4.
Fungal Growth now slows targets by 75% (behavioral change from previous root).
Fungal Growth radius increased from 2.0 to 2.5.
Infested Terran: Infested Gauss Rifle damage reduced from 8 to 6.
Infested Terran: Infested Gauss Rifle no longer targets air units.
Infested Terran: New anti-air weapon Infested Rockets (14 damage, 0.95 period, range 6) and is prioritized over the ground weapon.
Infested Terran: Now affected by Zerg missile attack and ground carapace upgrades.
New ability Oversight: Increases vision by 25% and immobilizes the Overseer.
Parasitic Bomb damage increased from 60 to 120 over 7 seconds.
Parasitic Bomb damage no longer stacks.
Parasitic Bomb now has a 0.7-second delay before effects begin.
Movement speed reduced from 4.13 to 3.15.
Now morphed from a Drone instead of from the Hydralisk Den.
New upgrade Adaptive Talons (Hive; 150/150; 54s): Reduces burrow time from 2.0 to 0.7 seconds and increases movement speed by 10%.
Movement speed increased from 0.82 to 0.902; Pneumatized Carapace still increases speed to 2.63.
